laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver appears normal in echotexture with no focal liver lesions identified. The common bile duct measures 0.3 cm and is within normal limits. The gallbladder appears contracted about multiple gallstones, with diffuse gallbladder wall thickening measuring up to 7 mm and gallbladder wall edema, which is persistent but slightly improved compared to the prior US. No evidence of pericholecystic fluid. The main portal vein is patent. No free fluid.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall edema is persistent but slightly improved compared to the prior US.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.7 mmol/L (specific test not mentioned with reference range of 0.5 - 2.0 mmol/L).
